author: Justin Hawkins Rides Again
description:
I've come home for 4 days before the start of my US tour with The Darkness - just in time for Halloween with my daughter. It also happened to be the release date for "Everybody Scream" - Florence + The Machine's latest album. I'm still recovering from the European tour - but I thought I'd give it a listen, starting with the title track ....
To listen to "Everybody Scream" uninterrupted: https://youtu.be/03iBgkXb1EE?si=IyRjNWR-4Bugmcw3

To see Justin Hawkins Rides Again LIVE across the UK, you can find tickets here: 
https://www.aegpresents.co.uk/event/justin-hawkins-rides-again/

Join my Patreon community here: http://www.patreon.com/jushawk

For Cameo messages: https://www.cameo.com/justinhawkins

The Darkness are touring the USA in November: https://www.thedarknesslive.com/tour-dates/

Get a Justin Hawkins Rides Again T-Shirt & Hoodie here: https://thejawsofvictory

#reaction #musicreview #florenceandthemachine
title: "Everybody Scream" for Halloween: Florence + The Machine
